title: Trump appeals civil contempt order and $10,000 daily fine - CNN
content:
1. Trump appeals civil contempt order and $10,000 daily fine  CNN
  2. New York judge holds Trump in contempt of court  CBS News
  3. 'Trump has willfully disobeyed a lawful order of this court,' New York judge says as $10,000 per-day fines start  CNBC
  4. Daily $10K fines against Trump start today after contempt ruling  New York Post
  5. New York judge holds Trump in contempt of court in state attorney general's civil probe  Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Former President Donald Trump has appealed a judge's civil contempt order imposing a $10,000 daily fine for failing to comply with a subpoena from the New York attorney general for records tied to an investigation into the Trump Organization's finances.
